title: Cape, 17th–18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: supplementary warp pile (velvet) and bobbin lace
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: A cape or cope for a statue with a patterned velvet of light browns with metallic thread and metallic bobbin lace trim.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cape, 17th–18th century.
17th–18th century. Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: supplementary warp pile (velvet) and bobbin lace. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-56-59.
